slider.title: The First Sneak-Peek of Startup Design Framework
slider.description: The most important parts of the Startup Framework are Samples and the UI Kit that includes a set of different components. The samples consist of a set of 25 pages.
slider.footer_text: You can Sign In with popular Social Networks
